lead_paragraph: A ruling on whether an Illinois law aimed at easing the state's huge unfunded pension liability is constitutional will be issued on Friday, a judge overseeing the case said on Thursday.

headline.main: Ruling on Illinois Pension Reform Law Due Friday
headline.print_headline: Ruling on Illinois Pension Reform Law Due Friday

snippet: A ruling on whether an Illinois law aimed at easing the state's huge unfunded pension liability is constitutional will be issued on Friday, a judge overseeing the case said on Thursday....
